result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Charles E Anthoney

records.addlTxt: INCLUDES: 22CF383, 22CM64

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 8:35 a.m. 
INCLUDES: 22CF383, 22CM64.
State appears by ADA Hannah Runde in person. Defendant FAILS to appear. with Atty Peter Vu.
VRCW.

ADA Runde requests BW and bond forfeiture.
Atty Vu does not know where his client is. 
COURT GRANTS BW $500.00.

Adjourned: 8:36 a.m.
INCLUDES: 22CF383, 22CM64.
Final pre-trial on October 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

9:34 AM Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 9:49 a.m.  
INCLUDES: 22CF383, 22CM64.
State appears by ADA Alex Lech in person. Defendant FAILS to appear, with Atty Peter Vu in person.
VRCW.

Atty Vu notes his client was recently released from treatment, but is not certain of his status. 
ADA Lech requests BW and bond forfeiture.
COURT questions if there is a warrant on Deft through probation.
Atty Vu indicates he has been in contact with the agent and there is no warrant that he is aware of at this time. 
COURT declines to issue a warrant today, and resets FPT. 

DATES:
FPT/TP: 10/18/22 @ 8:30 a.m. 

Adjourned: 9:52 a.m.
Final pre-trial on September 13, 2022 at 09:45 am.

Pre-trial conference on July 13, 2022 at 10:30 am.

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 3:20 p.m.
INCLUDES: 22CF383, 22CM64. 
State appears by ADA Jonathan Barnett in person. Defendant appears in person, with Atty Peter Vu. 
VRCW.

Atty Vu ius anticipating a resolution, but Deft has picked up a new case, needs more time to get new offer and review. 

DATES:
